headline: Is Xylem Fairly Priced After a 19.9% Climb and Recent Pullback in 2025?
summary: Wondering if Xylem’s current share price actually represents good value? You’re not alone. Figuring out whether now is the time to buy is the big question on many investors’ minds. The stock has had a lively run this year, climbing 19.9% year-to-date. Although it has pulled back recently, dropping 7.3% in the past week and 5.3% in the last month. Some of these moves have come in the wake of sector-wide shifts and broader macroeconomic news, with heightened focus on water infrastructure and...
